group_1.textCenter: Thank you for coming!
What a great shopping day! The veggies@are so fresh and green.
I can use the ground chicken tonight and@make some meatballs.
And maybe make soup with the radishes?
Felicia might not be impressed though...
She says I cook like a grandma. [chara:100151:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:100151:cheek_0][chara:100151:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:100151:lipSynch_1]*Giggle*
What's this? There's a flyer in my shopping@bag...

group_1.narration: "February 14th only! Come try world-famous@chocolate for yourself at our one day sales@bonanza!"

group_1.textCenter: Oh, right. It's almost Valentine's Day.
What should I do this year?
(Let's see... Last time Mom and I made@sweets from scratch like we do every year.)
(Right, I made chocolate cake for Ui...)

group_1.textLeft: It turned out so well this year, didn't it?

group_1.textRight: Last year's was good, but this one's even@better!

group_1.textCenter: It was so much fun watching her eat it with@that big grin on her face...
That alone made me feel happy.
And made my stomach fill right up...
Wait, did I say stomach? I meant my @heart filled right up.
It's sad that I won't get a chance to give@her anything this year.
But I've got a lot of friends who always@help me.
So I want to give chocolates to everyone@at Mikazuki Villa.
That cake I made for Ui...
It's one of my favorites, and it's really@tasty, but...
I want to wait until Ui comes back to @make it again.
It might be better to buy something this@year instead of making it.
Yeah, I'll find chocolates for everyone.
I'll look when I'm out shopping tomorrow!
